comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: Herbert Edward Thompson was born in 1891. In the 1891 Census he lived with his father and mother Mr Samuel Shaw Thompson & Mrs Mary Ellen Shaw at 34 Brinton Terrace, Halifax. In the 1901 Census the family lived at 49 St Mary's Street, Halifax and in the 1911 Census they lived at 45 King Cross Street, Halifax. Herbert was shown at this time to be a plumber & sanitary engineer
